title: Naughty Shinobi Demo version 3
description:
Originally dubbed as â€˜Final Prototypeâ€™, the conceptual demo for â€˜Knights of a Broken Cityâ€, was a small experiment aimed at developing an interactive game environment mixing story and romance with adult and explicit subject matter. Sticking with the original concept, the project will return as a cyberpunk erotica building upon new ideas for the genre.

Knights is a science fiction dystopic story set in a world where Anthropomorphic beings coexist with Humans. The overruling dictatorial government held their religion to high belief, lead to population control, which entails government mandate sexual interactions and procreational banning. The demo takes a small piece of that story, on the eve of a major attack on the government by a rebellious group seeking sexual freedom. Mel and Viktor celebrate, two leaders of the rebellion, celebrate the last night at the Club Vix, partaking in â€œGovernment Regulatedâ€ credit services before the whole system is brought down. Although the story is incomplete in the demo, it does dabble in some interesting concepts that usually arenâ€™t realized first time playing, which we thought was appropriate enough for the interactive environment.
